skyra.osceleton

Class Joint

  • java.lang.Object
    • skyra.osceleton.Joint

  • public class Joint
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the x, y, and z coordinates of a joint. It has a helper method to parse a Joint OscMessage into a Joint object.

    Normally, the OSCeletonWrapper object will create skeletons and joints for you.
